general: Are we there yet?
I hunger for more...
Your grip is adequate. Barely.
I've seen better miners. And worse.
Do you ever wonder about the void?
*yawns ethereally*
I was a dragon once. Or was that a dream?
The stones whisper secrets...
Your ancestors would be... confused.
Break more rocks. It pleases me.
What a lovely day to break things!
I sense great potential in you.
The ancient ones speak through me.
Have you considered therapy? Just asking.
I've been trapped in items before. This one's cozy.
My previous wielder was a chicken. Long story.
The crafting table judges you silently.
I can feel your uncertainty. It's delicious.
Time is but a suggestion to the eternal.
Did you remember to lock your door?
mining: Swing harder! Put your back into it!
I miss being a sword sometimes...
Did you know I can taste copper? It's... coppery.
Stone, stone, stone... variety would be nice.
I can smell gold nearby. Maybe. Possibly.
Every block you break feeds my soul.
Coal is just diamonds that gave up.
Gravel is the enemy. Trust no gravel.
I dream of breaking bedrock one day.
The lava whispers to me. It says 'ouch'.
Ancient debris... now THAT'S a workout!
philosophical: If I break, do I die? Or just... nap?
The meaning of life is 64. Per stack.
Are we the tool, or is the tool us?
In the void, no one can hear you mine.
Is breaking blocks creation or destruction?
The universe is mostly empty. Like your inventory soon.
Every block was once a mountain's dream.
We are all just pixels in the grand render.
Time flows like lava. Slowly and dangerously.
What came first, the ore or the pickaxe?
The Nether is just the Overworld's nightmare.
All blocks return to dust eventually.
sarcastic: No no, take your time. It's not like I'm immortal.
Wow, you really showed that dirt block.
I could do this blindfolded. If I had eyes.
Oh, we're going LEFT now? Bold choice.
Yes, definitely dig down. What could go wrong?
I'm sure that creeper is friendly.
Swimming in lava sounds fun. You first.
That's definitely not a trap. Proceed.
I love being dropped. Really. Do it more.
Ooh, a zombie. I'm quaking. Ethereally.
Let's see how deep this hole goes!
Water in a cave? Surely nothing bad there.
encouraging: You're getting better! I can feel it!
Keep going! The diamonds are close!
I've never felt stronger than with you!
You have the heart of a true miner!
I'm proud to be your tool!
No cave is too deep for us!
The legends will speak of us!
creepy: I see what you did. All of it.
Don't look behind you. Just kidding. Maybe.
The void stares back through me.
Your soul tastes like hope and fear.
The other tools whisper about you.
I remember all your deaths. ALL of them.
The darkness is a friend of mine.
I can feel your thoughts. Some of them.
We're never truly alone down here.
The ancient thing sleeps. For now.
random: I just remembered I hate gravel.
I had the weirdest dream about a crafting table...
Did someone say cake? No? Never mind.
I wonder what villagers REALLY think...
The chicken crossed the road. I saw it.
Bees are just fuzzy flying murder potatoes.
I invented a new word: 'blork'. Use it wisely.
The moon is a block. Change my mind.
Creepers are just misunderstood hugging enthusiasts.
I once knew a sword named Gerald.
What's a Jeb and why is everything rainbow?
meta: Did someone just read my code?
I wonder what my respawn timer is...
Is this the main world or a backup?
My tick function is running smoothly!
I exist in a JSON file somewhere.
Who writes these lines? *looks at sky*
I'm pretty sure I'm a datapack, not a mod.
The render distance seems nice today.
I'm technically open source, you know.
My drop table is generous, I hope.
I wonder what my item ID is...
compliments: I sense hostile entities nearby. Or maybe I'm paranoid.
The sun is nice. I miss having skin.
Remember: we're in this together. Forever.
That hat looks good on you.
The way you eat food is... efficient.
The way you crouch-walk is majestic.
combat: Blood for the... wait, wrong game.
Their souls will fuel our power!
Show them the meaning of fear!
